vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.play (patch_4.sol#80-100):
	External calls:
	- loseWager(wagerAmount) (patch_4.sol#94)
	External calls sending eth:
	- payout(msg.sender,wagerAmount) (patch_4.sol#92)
	- loseWager(wagerAmount) (patch_4.sol#94)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- randomSeed (patch_4.sol#96)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_4.sol#80-100) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_4.sol#113-117):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_4.sol#114)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_4.sol#115)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_4.sol#119-123):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_4.sol#120)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_4.sol#121)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_4.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_4.sol#113-117):
	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_4.sol#114
